name: dotnet.system.memory
description:
This is a repackaging of System.Memory 4.5.3 from Nuget.org (https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Memory/4.5.3) including all dependencies.

This package contains:

- System.Memory.dll
- System.Buffers.dll
- System.Numerics.Vector.dll
- System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.dll
